name: Classic Beige T-Shirt
description: A timeless beige t-shirt designed for comfort and style. Perfect for casual outings and everyday wear.

name: Washed Hoodie
description: A casual yet stylish washed hoodie with a relaxed fit. Features a front pouch pocket and ribbed trims for added comfort.

name: Cargo Denim Trousers
description: Durable and stylish cargo denim trousers with multiple utility pockets. Designed for both function and fashion with an adjustable hem.

name: Waistcoat Dress
description: A stylish waistcoat dress that blends sophistication with comfort. Its sleek design makes it a perfect choice for any occasion.

name: Soft Check Mini Skirt
description: A chic and trendy mini skirt with a soft checkered pattern. The lightweight fabric ensures comfort throughout the day.

name: Denim Trousers
description: A pair of stylish denim trousers with a relaxed fit. Designed for versatility, they can be dressed up or down effortlessly.

name: Strapless Midi Dress
description: An elegant strapless midi dress designed for a sleek and sophisticated look. Perfect for special occasions or casual evenings.

name: Belted Ribbed T-Shirt
description: A trendy ribbed t-shirt featuring a stylish belt accent. A must-have for a fashionable yet comfortable look.

name: Denim-Effect Jacket
description: A trendy denim-effect jacket with a soft and comfortable feel. A versatile piece that pairs well with any outfit.

name: Ribbed Top
description: A sleek and minimalistic ribbed top designed for everyday wear. Its fitted silhouette makes it an ideal choice for layering.

name: Heart Collar Dress
description: A charming dress featuring a heart-shaped collar for a sweet and playful look. Made from soft fabric to ensure comfort all day long.

name: Kids Printed T-Shirt
description: A fun and colorful printed t-shirt designed for kids. Made from soft cotton for all-day comfort and play.

name: Elegant Gold Necklace
description: A timeless gold necklace with delicate circular and tubular metal details. Perfect for adding a touch of elegance to any outfit.

name: Black Leather Belt
description: A classic black leather belt designed for durability and style. A must-have accessory that complements both casual and formal looks.
